column4: I've been googling... where's that apt sources.list for ubuntu 9?
I have an old desktop and I have too much on my plate to update until next week
there is some backport repo you can use though
I want to just use the backport repo that can still be used. I admin several ubuntu boxes and they are upgraded
9.x is no longer supported, no sec-updates doesnt matter if you use backports
there are unofficial apt repos that mirror what the 9 repos had
i told you its out of support and the normal repos are down
I do not feel like spending 2 hours upgrading tonight. I will when my plate is clear
